name: Cold Coffee
description: This drink is not something you might find on a regular menu, but will surely soothe your heart on a hot summer day.
directions: Add instant coffee and water into a container.
Use full fat milk to add to the flavouring.
Add ice cubes to the container.
Add one cup vanilla ice cream to the mixture. Shake the ingredients well until light brown texture appears.
Pour the mixture into cocktail glasses and add a slice of vanilla ice cream on top. Bon Appetit
